attributes.action: Take action aginst confiscation of bottled water at the V festival and overpricing of food
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Last year's V festival recieved many complaints after V staff conviscated bottled water if it was not purchased from their water stands. Other complaints were recorded over the excessive pricing of food and programms. In the opinion of many festival goers, The V festival is nothing more than an excuse to make as much money as possible.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
